content.text:
# Filmfare Award for Best Music Director – Marathi

The Filmfare Best Music Album Award is given by the Filmfare magazine as part of its annual Filmfare Marathi Awards for Marathi Cinema, to the best composer/arranger of a soundtrack. This category was first presented in 1999. Shridhar Phadke was the first recipient of this award from the film Lekroo.
